# Some code

```{r}
data(chr22)
chr22 <- tmp ## fixme soon, also delete not publicly available samples
chr22.cpm <- logCPM(chr22)
chr22.smooth <- doBoxSmooth(chr22.cpm, h=5)
batches <- metadata(chr22.smooth)$R1_library_prep_date
chr22.bnbc <- bnbc(chr22.smooth, batches, 1e7, 40000, nbands=10)
```
